title: FLSA Minimum Wage Poster
summary: Most employers must display the Federal Minimum Wage poster.

actions.summary: Post the FLSA Minimum Wage poster in a conspicuous place.
Ensure poster is the most current version.

title: OSHA Hazard Communication Program
summary: Employers with hazardous chemicals must have a written HazCom program.

actions.summary: Develop and implement a written hazard communication program.
Maintain Safety Data Sheets (SDS) and employee training.

title: California Wage Theft Prevention Act Notice
summary: CA employers must provide a wage notice to non-exempt employees at hire.

actions.summary: Provide written wage notice to non-exempt employees at hire.

penalties: Penalties under CA Labor Code ยง2810.5.
